## Checklist Before Merge

<!-- All items must be completed before the PR is ready to merge -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] Code follows the project's style guide and TypeScript conventions
- [ ] All TypeScript types are properly defined (no `any` unless necessary)
- [ ] Linting passes: `npm run lint`
- [ ] No console errors or warnings introduced
- [ ] Code is self-documenting; complex logic has comments

### Testing
- [ ] All existing tests pass: `npm run test`
- [ ] New tests added for new functionality
- [ ] Edge cases and error scenarios are tested
- [ ] Test coverage is maintained or improved

### Verification
- [ ] Application builds successfully: `npm run build`
- [ ] Changes work as intended in development environment
- [ ] No unintended side effects or regressions
- [ ] Performance is not negatively impacted

### Documentation
- [ ] README or relevant documentation updated
- [ ] Comments added for non-obvious code sections
- [ ] API changes documented (if applicable)
- [ ] Environment variables or configuration changes documented

### Branch Management
- [ ] Branch is up-to-date with the target branch (`develop`)
- [ ] Commit history is clean (logical commits or squashed)
- [ ] No merge conflicts
- [ ] All commits follow conventional commit format

### Final Review
- [ ] I have reviewed my own changes before requesting review
- [ ] This PR is ready for team review
- [ ] I have assigned appropriate reviewers
- [ ] I have labeled this PR appropriately
